name: Charriage Defence
description:
Please, DO NOT force quit the game. Use the game's EXIT GAME button instead.

The game requires an internet connection to be able to send the gathered playtest data back to the developer.

UPDATE: 

  • Levels have been altered to reduce overall difficulty. 
  • The economy has been remade. Players earn more money per round and fences have reduced their prize.
  • Fences have been remade. They now don't block diagonal shots adjacent to them.
  • The store does not allow to open the purchase screen anymore if players do not have enough money.

This is a prototype made for my university module DES 308 Analytics and Data-Driven Game Design. The game collects user analytic data with the purpose of iterating on the game's design.
